myControl

Class RoomServiceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • myControl.RoomServiceManager

  • public class RoomServiceManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Static class to manage room service menu.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init()
        Method to initialize static class. set menu to be empty *

      • addItem

        public static boolean addItem(java.lang.String nameOfItem,
                              double cost)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to add in a roomserviceitem into the menu. Perform validation by looking up if an identical item name is already in the menu.
        Parameters:
        nameOfItem - name of new roomServiceItem
        cost - cost of new roomServiceItem
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - thrown when there exist an identical item name in the system. . also when the input string is null or empty or cost is less than zero

      • removeItem

        public static boolean removeItem(java.lang.String nameOfItem)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to remove item from menu. Do note that this method only removes item from the menu and not from guest's ordered services records
        Parameters:
        nameOfItem - name of item to be removed
        Returns:
        true if successful. false if otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - thrown when item name is empty or name does not exist in menu

      • editItem

        public static boolean editItem(java.lang.String nameOfItem,
                               double newPrice)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to edit item from menu.
        Parameters:
        nameOfItem - name of item to be edit
        newPrice - price of the item to be edit
        Returns:
        true if successful. false if otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - thrown when item name is empty or name does not exist in menu

      • addItemToGuest

        public static java.lang.String addItemToGuest(java.lang.String guestID,
                                              int index)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to add item to the guest
        Parameters:
        guestID -
        index - of the item
        Returns:
        name of the item
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - thrown

      • getMenuToString

        public static java.lang.String getMenuToString()
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to print out all items in menu. Similar to a toString method
        Returns:
        String representation of all items in the list
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - throws exception when the list is empty

      • getItemIndex

        protected static int getItemIndex(java.lang.String nameOfItem)
        Method to find the index of a roomService item based on name. protected. only callable by myControl package
        Parameters:
        nameOfItem - name of item to be search for
        Returns:
        index if found, -1 if otherwise

      • saveMenu

        public static void saveMenu()
        Method for serialisation. write arraylist into file
